amendment.description: To make certain improvements to the bill.

action.text: Amendment SA 2616, previously agreed to was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2616 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2616 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2285. (consideration: CR S1242) To make certain improvements to the bill.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2616 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
